byline.original: By KEVIN ROOSE and MARK SCOTT

abstract: Economic turmoil worldwide and at home threatens the profits and bonuses at the big banks, the New York comptroller said.
snippet: Economic turmoil worldwide and at home threatens the profits and bonuses at the big banks, the New York comptroller said.

headline.main: New York May Lose 10,000 Wall St. Jobs, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Report Predicts New York City May Lose 10,000 Wall St. Jobs
